radix define States {
 11'b00000 "A"
 11'b00001 "B"
 11'b00010 "C"
 11'b00011 "D"
 11'b00100 "E"
 11'b00101 "F"
 11'b00110 "G"
 11'b00111 "H"
 11'b01000 "I"
 11'b01001 "J"
 11'b01010 "K"
 11'b01011 "L"
 11'b01100 "M"
 11'b01101 "N"
 11'b01110 "O"
 11'b01111 "P"
 11'b10000 "Q"
 11'b10001 "R"
 11'b10010 "S"
 11'b10011 "T"
 11'b10100 "U"
 11'b10101 "V"
 11'b10110 "W"
 11'b10111 "X"
 11'b11000 "Y"
 11'b11001 "Z"
 -default hex
}
